episodes.title: Healing from Cult Abuse - Interview with Nikki G, Trauma Recovery Coach and Cult Survivor
episodes.description:
In this series, I interview Nikki G, Trauma Recovery Coach and cult survivor on healing from religious and cult abuse. We discuss the many reasons someone may join a cult, how you can identify if you are a part of a cult, and how to break the cycle for good!

You can follow Nikki G's work by visiting her website: nikkigspeaks.com.

You can follow my work by visiting survivingreligiousnarcissism.com. You can also follow me on TikTok,  @vijjimichael and on instagram, @survivingreligiousnarcissism.

If you are interested in having your story or expertise featured on survivingreligiousnarcissism.com, please email me at vijji.michael@survivingreligiousnarcissism.com 

Thanks!

episodes.title: 5 Steps to Overcome Church Abuse
episodes.description:
Overcoming Church Abuse: 5 Steps to Meaningful Change and Healing 
1. Unravel Toxic Theology 
2. Go No Contact With High-control Religion 
3. Don't Replace Mental Healthcare With Church Counseling 
4. Befriend Being Disliked and Misunderstood 

To explore more, visit survivingreligiousnarcissism.com 

#exvangelical #deconstruction

episodes.title: Overcoming Church Abuse - 4 Befriend Being Disliked and Misunderstood
episodes.description:
This video is the forth of 5 in this series. It is a part of module 4 of the free Overcoming Church Abuse course that can be found on survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course. 

This video discusses the impact that church abuse has on self-esteem and self-worth, how to evict the harsh inner critic, and how to stop caring about what other people say or think. It may be hard at first, but learning how to be true to ourselves is one of the most empowering experiences we can ever have. 

Series Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAScdYKruqiDliSmAwR83hUI6O7xZxBco
Course: survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course
eBook Store: survivingreligiousnarcissism.bigcartel.com

#selflove #religiousabuse #healingjourney #cultsurvivor #exvangelical

episodes.title: Overcoming Church Abuse - 3 Don't Replace Mental Healthcare With Church Counseling
episodes.description:
This video is the third of 5 in this series. It is a part of module 3 of the free Overcoming Church Abuse course that can be found on survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course. 

This video discusses the ways in which church abuse can impact mental health, why church counseling doesn't replace mental healthcare, and how to find the right therapist. It offers a simple tool than can be used to narrow down what mental health approaches and providers may be right for you.

Series Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAScdYKruqiDliSmAwR83hUI6O7xZxBco
Course: survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course
eBook Store: survivingreligiousnarcissism.bigcartel.com

#religion #religiousabuse #healingjourney #mentalhealth #therapy #exvangelical

episodes.title: Overcoming Church Abuse - 2 Go No Contact With High - Control Religion
episodes.description:
This video is the second of 5 in this series. It is a part of module 2 of the free Overcoming Church Abuse course that can be found on survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course. 

This video discusses 10 signs that it is time to go no contact with your religious community. The purpose of going no contact is to break the cycle of abuse and to protect our peace. 

The purpose of this video isn't to  tell the viewer what they should do. But to offer the viewer information that they can use to make the decision that is best for them. 

Series Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAScdYKruqiDliSmAwR83hUI6O7xZxBco
Course: survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course
eBook Store: survivingreligiousnarcissism.bigcartel.com

#no contact #churchabuse #spiritualabuse #healingjourney #churchhurt #exvangelical

episodes.title: Overcoming Church Abuse - 1 Unravel Toxic Theology
episodes.description:
This video is the first of 5 in this series. It is a part of module 1 of the free Overcoming Church Abuse course that can be found on survivingreligiousnarcissism.com/course. 

It discusses what theology is, what toxic theologies we have been taught and how they impacted us, and how to go about rejecting toxic religious beliefs. It offers a simple tool that can be used to unravel any theology in question.

episodes.title: The Dark Side of Contemporary Christian Music
episodes.description:
In light of the Michael Tait controversy, this video offers a brief history of the relationship between the contemporary Christian Music Industry, Evangelicalism, and Christian Nationalism. The purpose is to explain the issues of abuse found in the CCM Industry.

#michaeltait #religiousnarcissism #religiousabuse #exvangelical #deconstruction

episodes.title: Growing Up with a Narcissistic Adoptive Parent
episodes.description:
Adoptive parents are often regarded as heroes. For me, being adopted by a religious narcissist became a journey through abuse, manipulation, and gaslighting. In this video, I open up about my experience growing up with a narcissistic adoptive parent—what it looked like, how it shaped me, and the hidden damage that came with constant abuse from a pillar of the community.

#religiousnarcissism #churchhurt #adoption #narcissist #healingjourney #exvangelical

episodes.title: "Christian" Parenting and Narcissistic Family Patterns
episodes.description:
What happens when religious devotion is used to justify control, abuse, or manipulation? In this video, we explore the intersection of Christian parenting—particularly within Evangelical culture—and the development of narcissistic family patterns. Whether you're deconstructing your upbringing, a parent seeking a balance between faith and mental health, or simply curious about how religion shapes family roles—this video offers insights, stories, and psychological context to help unpack these complex dynamics.

Sources for this video include:

Don’t You Know Who I Am: How to Stay Sain in an Era of Narcissism, Entitlement, and Incivility, by Dr. Ramani Durvasula, PH.D

Jesus and John Wayne: How White Evangelicals Corrupted a Faith and Fractured a Nation, by Kristin Kobes Du Mez

God and the Gay Christian: The Biblical Case in Support of Same-Sex Relationships, Matthew Vines

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A16Ey8c61WA&t=2455s

https://mburtwrites.substack.com/p/when-daring-to-discipline-failed

https://time.com/6995417/dobson-parenting-advice-history/

https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/americanexperience/features/billy-graham-tale-two-preachers/

https://www.splcenter.org/resources/extremist-files/focus-family/

#religiousnarcissism #healingjourney #jamesdobson #churchhurt #spiritualhealing #nocontact

episodes.title: When Narcissism Meets Religious Delusion
episodes.description:
What happens when narcissism and religion collide? In this video, we explore the disturbing and complex world of narcissists who experience religious delusions. These individuals often use spiritual language and authority to manipulate, control, and harm others. I drew from both personal experience and research done on this topic for this video.

Link to last video: https://youtu.be/2ko4XB0jaNg

Sources:
https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/night-sweats-and-delusions-grandeur/202207/inside-my-manic-mind-delusions-and-hyper-religiosity
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gE_u_PJL5_I&t=1644
https://arno.uvt.nl/show.cgi?fid=114836#:~:text=The%20main%20areas%20involved%20in,the%20regular%20expression%20of%20religiosity
https://scholarworks.waldenu.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=15978&context=dissertations
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ePUn0qbTZY&pp=0gcJCdgAo7VqN5tD

#religiousnarcissism #narcissist #healingjourney #mentalillness #spiritualawakening

episodes.title: Faith, Fantasy, and Religious Delusion: My Story
episodes.description:
Are powerful religious beliefs always a sign of faith - or can they cross over to delusion? In religious and spiritual communities,  the lines often blur. In this video, I share my experience of how my religious practice crossed over into mental health delusion and what has helped me recover. This video offers a thoughtful, respectful look at a controversial topic.

#churchhurt #mentalillness #religiousnarcissism #spiritualabuse #narcissism #spiritualnarcissist

episodes.title: When Belief Hurts More Than It Heals
episodes.description:
Do unanswered prayers expose flaws in our beliefs? If you have ever felt betrayed by faith, you are not alone. This is a raw, honest conversation about toxic theology, spiritual manipulation, and learning how to rebuild a healthier, more authentic sense of self.

#religiousnarcissism #churchhurt #narcissism #spiritualabuse #spiritualawakening

episodes.title: Religious Narcissism: Doing Good for the Wrong Reasons?
episodes.description:
In this video, we'll explore the concept of religious narcissism—when faith and morality become entangled with control and self-interest. From the promise of heaven to avoiding punishment, we'll break down how reward-based morality can distort the true essence of empathy, community, and spiritual growth. Whether you're religious, spiritual, or just curious about the psychology behind belief and behavior, this video invites you to reflect on why we really do good.

Watch Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5w_nyxFLBCc&list=PLAScdYKruqiBplSJVartEeOyONywU9Xc9

🔔 Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more honest conversations about faith, ethics, and human nature.

#narcissist  #religiousnarcissism #gooddeeds #churchhurt #spiritualabuse
